Description:

Take the command of the most powerful army the ancient world , turn their country into a great empire and make your enemies bow to the military, economic and political power . Of course , some will admire your progress , while others will be envious , it is possible that among the last will and your closest associates .
Will the traitors pay you a stab in the back , or the first to oppose the old friends? How many of you are willing to sacrifice for the sake of Rome became exactly the way you want it to be? Took the title of Emperor , will you defend the republic , or turn into a brutal dictator?
